#summary SVN Repository

= Instructions =

   #1 Download and install [http://tortoisesvn.tigris.org/ TortoiseSVN].
   #2 Create a new folder.
   #3 Right-Click on the new folder that you created in step 2.
   #4 Click SVN Checkout.
   #5 Enter the URL https://pine-apple.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ where it asks for "URL of repository."
   #6 Click OK
   #7 Enter google username
   #8 Enter password generated from [http://code.google.com/hosting/settings settings] (must be logged in to view settings)
   #9 Click OK
